name: SmartIoTCONTROLS
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, dim light”
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The SmartIoTCONTROLS is a groundbreaking mobile, wearable, embedded and web app that allow seamless control over all property aspects, including not limited to lighting, climate, appliances, curtain, blind, multi room audio, security, digital surveillance, entertainment and energy saving.

Use this skill to discover and interact with your household appliances connected to Smart IoT Controls devices. You must be a registered customer with Smart IoT Controls and should be having an Amazon account to use this skill. The Skill is currently supported by Smart IoT Controls dimmers, relays, curtains, blinds, HVAC, scenes, events, salto and green audio
